testimony: I call Kifuwe Michael Nhlapo.  On page 2, it's the last name of the list applicant 7303, page 187 of Volume 2.

We left the danger zone, taken the direction of Extension 5, looking for Sibongele.  We found her there, we tried to bring her back.  She struggle, we forced her.  We first started at her place. After some time Jabu came also.  Jabu asked me if the job was done already in the house.  I told Jabu that I had nothing since I've been standing there but nothing happened and Jabu got into the house also.
But I understood you now to say you were standing outside the house with Joseph, is that correct?

And after a further while M'Africa also came out of the house

Jabu came from another direction.  He got into the house, I heard that they were arguing inside. We brought her back to the house and I must had took her to the house and we left the place and I must have shot her and she came back to us and she told us that the job was done and we left the scene.

I was watching for in case the police - I was watching for in case one of them tried to run away and the police also.
